acCalendar - Class in com.example.foodfight
acCalendar class provides selection of day (within a Â±1 year constraint) for use by acMeal activity (and subsequent activities) as part of the index for retrieving meal content from the database.

acFoodItem - Class in com.example.foodfight
acFoodItem class use retrieved food data (food name, calories, serving size, serving unit, and brand name) from database and other acMeal class to update activity_food_item.xml
acFoodItem() - Constructor for class com.example.foodfight.acFoodItem
 
acFoodList - Class in com.example.foodfight
acFoodList class interact with the database to display on activity_food_list.xml a list of foods added by user.
acFoodList() - Constructor for class com.example.foodfight.acFoodList
 
acMeals - Class in com.example.foodfight
acMeals class displays (on activity_meals.xml) the meals that can be reviewed or edited by the user.

acTrend class is part of the stretch goal where calorie trends are graphically displayed.

Api - Class in com.example.foodfight
Api class interfaces with nutritionix API to search for food data and returns a map of json food objects and values via NutriApiEngine function.
Api() - Constructor for class com.example.foodfight.Api
 
ApiHandler - Class in com.example.foodfight
ApiHandler class manages food map from Api class so that food name, manufacturer, calories, serving unit, and serving size are retrieved from the map for use in other activities.
